## MC tags for the L1T emulator

Following O2O tags are expected to be present in the Monte Carlo Global Tags:

System      |   Tag           |  Status
------------|-----------------|------------------
uGT RS      | <span style="font-family:helvetica;color:green">L1TGlobalPrescalesVetos_<span style="font-weight:bold">passThrough_mc</span></span> | already present
CALOL{1,2}  | <span style="font-family:helvetica;color:green">L1TCaloParams_<span style="font-weight:bold">static_v94.6.1_2017_v1_7</span></span> | 
uGMT        | <span style="font-family:helvetica;color:green">L1TMuonGlobalParams_<span style="font-weight:bold">static_v94.6.1</span></span>     |
BMTF        | <span style="font-family:helvetica;color:green">L1TMuonBarrelParams_<span style="font-weight:bold">static_v94.6.1</span></span>     |
OMTF        | <span style="font-family:helvetica;color:green">L1TMuonOverlapParams_<span style="font-weight:bold">Stage2v0_hlt</span></span>      | same everywhere
EMTF Forest | <span style="font-family:helvetica;color:green">L1TMuonEndCapForest_<span style="font-weight:bold">static_Sq_20170523_mc</span></span> | new pT LUT
